name: browser(_:draggingImageForRowsWith:inColumn:with:offset:)
desc: Sent to the delegate to obtain an image to represent dragged rows during a drag operation on a browser.
declaration:
optional func browser(_ browser: NSBrowser, 
draggingImageForRowsWith rowIndexes: IndexSet, 
             inColumn column: Int, 
                 with event: NSEvent, 
               offset dragImageOffset: NSPointPointer) -> NSImage?
